roleset.name: coordinate
roleset.note: MESH-V NOTES: Frames file for 'mesh' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from mesh.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: missing agent
example.text: But just how does Mr. Downey's unorthodox style mesh with the sedate tone of CNBC's business programming?
example.arg: with the sedate tone of CNBC 's business programming

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1 and ARG2
example.text: During the Aspire Academy opening ceremony , academy president Stan Shih , chairman of the Acer Group , remarked that he hopes to introduce management models from Europe and America and mesh them with the unique attributes of Taiwanese industry to enhance the globalization of Asian business .
example.arg: with the unique attributes of Taiwanese industry
to enhance the globalization of Asian business
